local_intent: Perceive red_plate, move above, align, lower until contact, release white_plate, retreat and wait
assumptions: red_plate is within camera view or reachable after scan
Workspace clear for lowering and retreat
coherence_with_global: Implements the transfer-phase steps from GLOBAL_BT: detect/scan for red plate, MoveAbove (as active leaf), precise alignment, gentle lowering until contact, open gripper to release, then retreat and wait.
